Class ConcaveMirror

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Mirror
        • CurvedMirror
          • ConcaveMirror

  • public class ConcaveMirror
extends CurvedMirror
    The "ConcaveMirror" class, similar to the CurvedMirror, but in a concave shape (the outside of a circle).
    Version:
    V1.0.0, 10 June, 2014
    Author:
    Erik Trinh

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConcaveMirror(int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean side, java.awt.image.BufferedImage icon)
      A constructor for the class, sets the x-coord, y-coord, width, height, side which is reflective.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(java.awt.geom.Point2D point)
      Checks if this point is found in the Ellipse2D or circle.
      double findXCoord(double y)
      Returns the x-coordinate of this mirror given the y-coordinate.

      • Methods inherited from class CurvedMirror

        findTangentSlope, getCentreX, getCentreY, getCircle, getRadius, getReflectSide, reflect, slopeToAngle

      • Methods inherited from class GameObject

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConcaveMirror

        public ConcaveMirror(int x,
             int y,
             int width,
             int height,
             boolean side,
             java.awt.image.BufferedImage icon)
        A constructor for the class, sets the x-coord, y-coord, width, height, side which is reflective. Also sets up the Ellipse2D or circle, and calculates the centre of it, and the radius.
        Parameters:
        x - int for the x-coord.
        y - int for the y-coord.
        width - int for the width.
        height - int for the height.
        side - boolean for which side is reflective, false for right, true for left.
        icon - BufferedImage, stores the image used for the mirror.

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.awt.geom.Point2D point)
        Checks if this point is found in the Ellipse2D or circle. Returns false if it is, and true if it is not. This is because this is a concave mirror, which means it needs to check if the inverse space of the Ellipse contains it.
        Overrides:
        contains in class CurvedMirror
        Parameters:
        point - the Point2D to be checked.
        Returns:
        false if the point is contained in the Ellipse, true if not.

      • findXCoord

        public double findXCoord(double y)
        Returns the x-coordinate of this mirror given the y-coordinate.
        Overrides:
        findXCoord in class CurvedMirror
        Parameters:
        y - double for the y-coordinate used to find the corresponding x-coordinate of this circle/mirror.
        temp - double, used to store a temporary value.
        Returns:
        the double value of the x-coordinate corresponding to this y-coordinate
